data.name: 3on3 FreeStyle - 2nd Anniversary Gift pack
data.detailed_description:
Celebrating 2nd Anniversary for 3on3 FreeStyle Steam, We give you 3 max level Characters for 30 days along with 7 days of 2x Coin gain from 3vs3 mode! Catch up with the latest Characters with steamy Jersey set specially made for Steam only!

==Steam 2nd Anniversary Special Gift==
- Max Level Character selection Ticket (30d) x 1
- Steam Robot Arm Outfit x1 (All Character wearable)
- 100% Coin Buff Aqua Ball(7d) x1
- 10,000 Coin
- 50 Points

**This Package is available till 8/30 and please be advised the package will not be downloadable after that.

data.short_description: Gift alert! Catch up with the latest with free 2nd Anniversary gift that grants a max level Character for 30 days!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

  • Processor: Core i3-4370
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
